name: Aero Team Moldova
about: Aero Team Moldova is a cutting-edge flight training institution dedicated to producing highly skilled and safety-conscious pilots. Established to address the growing need for professional aviation training in Moldova, our school offers a comprehensive range of programs, including integrated and modular training solutions, under EASA regulations. With a fleet of modern Diamond aircraft and experienced instructors, we provide a safe, realistic, and practice-oriented learning environment. Our curriculum includes ground school, practical flight training, and instrument rating courses, ensuring students are well-prepared for careers in aviation. We are committed to delivering top-quality training at competitive prices, supporting our students every step of the way to achieve their aviation goals. At Aero Team Moldova, we strive to build a strong aviation community and foster the next generation of professional pilots.
services: ["Flight on the Sting plane\nFlight on the Pipistrel plane\nFlying a Cessna"]
